disk_detail_type.Description: You can choose a disk detail type code of HDD and SSD. default: HDD

name.Description: Block storage name. default: Assigned by Ncloud

server_instance_no.Description: Server instance number to attach. Required value. The server instance number can be obtained through the getServerInstanceList action.

size.Description: Enter the block storage size to be created. You can enter in GB units, and you can only enter up to 1000 GB.

block_storage_instance_no.Description: Block storage instance No for creating snapshot.

description.Description: Descriptions on a snapshot to create

instance_status_name.Description: Block Storage Snapshot Instance Status Name

name.Description: Block storage snapshot name to create. default : Ncloud assigns default values.

algorithm_type.Description: Load balancer algorithm type code. The available algorithms are as follows: [ROUND ROBIN (RR) | LEAST_CONNECTION (LC)]. Default: ROUND ROBIN (RR)

description.Description: Description of a load balancer to create

internet_line_type.Description: Internet line identification code. PUBLC(Public), GLBL(Global). default : PUBLC(Public)

name.Description: Name of a load balancer to create. Default: Automatically specified by Ncloud.

network_usage_type.Description: Network usage identification code. PBLIP(PublicIp), PRVT(PrivateIP). default : PBLIP(PublicIp)

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

rule_list.Description: Load balancer rules are required to create a load balancer.

certificate_name.Description: Load balancer SSL certificate. Required when the protocol_type value is SSL/HTTPS.

l7_health_check_path.Description: Health check path of load balancer rules. Required when the protocol_type is HTTP/HTTPS.

load_balancer_port.Description: Load balancer port of load balancer rules

protocol_type.Description: Protocol type code of load balancer rules. The following codes are available. [HTTP | HTTPS | TCP | SSL]

proxy_protocol_use_yn.Description: Use 'Y' if you want to check client IP addresses by enabling the proxy protocol while you select TCP or SSL.

server_port.Description: Server port of load balancer rules

server_instance_no_list.Description: List of server instance numbers to be bound to the load balancer

certificate_chain.Description: Chainca certificate (Required if the certificate is issued with a chainca)

certificate_name.Description: Name of a certificate to add

key_name.Description: Key name to generate. If the generated key name exists, an error occurs.

cifs_user_name.Description: CIFS user name. The ID must contain a combination of English alphabet and numbers, which can be 6-20 characters in length.

cifs_user_password.Description: CIFS user password. The password must contain a combination of at least 2 English letters, numbers and special characters, which can be 8-14 characters in length.

custom_ip_list.Description: To add a server of another account to the NAS volume, enter a private IP address of the server.

instance_custom_ip_list.Description: NAS volume instance custom IP list

is_event_configuration.Description: Indicates whether the event is set.

is_snapshot_configuration.Description: Indicates whether a snapshot volume is set.

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

server_instance_no_list.Description: List of server instance numbers for which access to NFS is to be controlled

volume_name_postfix.Description: Name of a NAS volume to create. Enter a volume name that can be 3-20 characters in length after the name already entered for user identification.

volume_size.Description: Enter the nas volume size to be created. You can enter in GB units.

zone.Description: Zone code. Zone in which you want to create a NAS volume.

port_forwarding_internal_port.Description: Internal port for port forwarding. Only the following ports are available. [Linux: `22` | Windows: `3389`]

server_instance_no.Description: Server instance number for which port forwarding is set
Server instance No. to assign after creating a public IP. You can get one by calling getPublicIpTargetServerInstanceList.

zone.Description: Zone code. You can determine the ZONE where the server will be created. It can be obtained through the getZoneList action. Default : Assigned by NAVER Cloud Platform.

access_control_group_configuration_no_li.Description: You can set the ACG created when creating the server. ACG setting number can be obtained through the getAccessControlGroupList action. Default : Default ACG number

fee_system_type_code.Description: A rate system identification code. There are time plan(MTRAT) and flat rate (FXSUM). Default : Time plan(MTRAT)

internet_line_type.Description: Internet line identification code. PUBLC(Public), GLBL(Global). default : PUBLC(Public)

is_protect_server_termination.Description: You can set whether or not to protect return when creating. default : false

login_key_name.Description: The login key name to encrypt with the public key. Default : Uses the most recently created login key name

member_server_image_no.Description: Required value when creating a server from a manually created server image. It can be obtained through the getMemberServerImageList action.

name.Description: Server name to create. default: Assigned by ncloud

server_image_product_code.Description: Server image product code to determine which server image to create. It can be obtained through getServerImageProductList. You are required to select one among two parameters: server image product code (server_image_product_code) and member server image number(member_server_image_no).

server_product_code.Description: Server product code to determine the server specification to create. It can be obtained through the getServerProductList action. Default : Selected as minimum specification. The minimum standards are 1. memory 2. CPU 3. basic block storage size 4. disk type (NET,LOCAL)

user_data.Description: The server will execute the user data script set by the user at first boot. To view the column, it is returned only when viewing the server instance. You must need base64 Encoding, URL Encoding before put in value of userData. If you don't URL Encoding again it occurs signature invalid error.

zone.Description: Zone code. You can determine the ZONE where the server will be created. It can be obtained through the getZoneList action. Default : Assigned by NAVER Cloud Platform.

access_control_groups.Description: A List of access control group configuration no

configuration_no_list.Description: List of ACG configuration numbers you want to get

is_default_group.Description: Indicates whether to get default groups only

name.Description: Name of the ACG you want to get

access_control_group_configuration_no.Description: Access control group setting number to search

access_control_group_name.Description: Access control group name to search

source_configuration_no.Description: Source access control rule configuration no

source_name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the source access control rule list returned by ncloud

access_control_group_configuration_no.Description: Access control group setting number to search

access_control_rules.Description: A list of access control rules configuration no

source_name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the ACG rule list returned by ncloud

block_storage_total_rows.Description: Member server image block storage total rows

block_storage_total_size.Description: Member server image block storage total size

name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the member server image list returned by ncloud

no_list.Description: List of member server images to view

original_base_block_storage_disk_type.Description: Original base block storage disk type

platform_type_code_list.Description: List of platform codes of server images to view

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

member_server_images.Description: A list of Member server image no

name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the member server image list returned by ncloud

no_list.Description: List of member server images to view

output_file.Description: The name of file that can save data source after running `terraform plan`.

platform_type_code_list.Description: List of platform codes of server images to view

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.
Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

zone.Description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

nas_volumes.Description: A list of NAS Volume Instance no

zone.Description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

zone.Description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

instance_no_list.Description: List of public IP instance numbers to get.

is_associated.Description: Indicates whether the public IP address is associated or not.

list.Description: List of public IP addresses to get.

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

sorted_by.Description: The column based on which you want to sort the list.

sorting_order.Description: Sorting order of the list. `ascending` (Ascending) | `descending` (Descending) [case insensitive]. Default: `ascending` Ascending

zone.Description: Zone code. You can filter the list of public IP instances by zones. All the public IP addresses in the zone of the region will be selected if the filter is not specified.

exclusion_product_code.Description: Product code you want to exclude from the list.

platform_type_code_list.Description: Values required for identifying platforms in list-type.

product_code.Description: Product code you want to view on the list. Use this when searching for 1 product.

product_name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the server image list returned by ncloud.

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

exclusion_product_code.Description: Product code you want to exclude from the list.

platform_type_code_list.Description: Values required for identifying platforms in list-type.

product_name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the server image list returned by ncloud.

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

server_images.Description: A list of server image product code.

exclusion_product_code.Description: Enter a product code to exclude from the list.

internet_line_type_code.Description: Internet line identification code. PUBLC(Public), GLBL(Global). default : PUBLC(Public)

product_code.Description: Enter a product code to search from the list. Use it for a single search.

product_name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the Server Product list returned.

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

server_image_product_code.Description: You can get one from `data ncloud_server_images`. This is a required value, and each available server's specification varies depending on the server image product.

zone.Description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

product_code.Description: Enter a product code to search from the list. Use it for a single search.

product_name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply to the Server Product list returned.

region.Description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

server_image_product_code.Description: You can get one from `data ncloud_server_images`. This is a required value, and each available server's specification varies depending on the server image product.

server_products.Description: A list of server product code.

zone.Description: Zone code. You can decide a zone where servers are created. You can decide which zone the product list will be requested at. You can get one by calling `data ncloud_zones`. default : Select the first Zone in the specific region
